subTitle: Full Stack Development
title: pkdreamers.com
description: Founded and developed pkdreamers, an innovative platform connecting travelers with tour agencies in Pakistan, using the MERN stack. Engineered comprehensive front-end and back-end solutions, including user interfaces in React and Next.js, and API development with GraphQL, Node.js, and Express.

responsibilities.title: Front-End Development
responsibilities.description: Developed user interfaces in React and Next.js, ensuring responsive and user-friendly experiences.

responsibilities.title: Back-End Development
responsibilities.description: Engineered API development with GraphQL, Node.js, and Express, integrating MongoDB and MySQL databases for robust data handling.

subTitle: Full Stack Development
title: paramountliquor.com.au
description: Led full-stack development for paramountliquor.com.au, a platform facilitating liquor distribution and management across Australia. Implemented both front-end and back-end systems, ensuring high-availability and scalability.

responsibilities.title: Front-End Development
responsibilities.description: Designed and implemented user-centric interfaces using React and Next.js for a smooth browsing and ordering experience.

responsibilities.title: Back-End Development
responsibilities.description: Developed APIs with Node.js and GraphQL, integrating MySQL for efficient data management and transactional processes.

subTitle: Full Stack Development
title: Case Management System
description: Responsible for the development of a high-availability online case management system, enhancing digital court operations across Victoria for improved efficiency and public accessibility.

responsibilities.title: Front-End Development
responsibilities.description: Designed user-centric, responsive React interfaces, significantly enhancing user experience for court staff and the public.

responsibilities.title: Back-End Development
responsibilities.description: Architected and implemented backend solutions using Java and Groovy with PostgreSQL for data storage, ensuring scalable, secure data processing for comprehensive legal case management.

responsibilities.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
responsibilities.description: Involved in cross-functional collaboration to align system development with the nuanced requirements of the legal domain, ensuring comprehensive feature integration and user satisfaction.
